translations: 中客车；微型客车；小型公共汽车

sentences.sentence: The front of me was a microbus.
The research on the air conditioning matching of HAISHI SY-6480 microbus.
sentences.translation: 本文围绕金杯海狮sy—6480系列面包车的空调系统进行匹配研究。

sentences.sentence: To fund their business, Jobs sold his Volkswagen microbus. Wozniak sold his calculator.
sentences.translation: 为了筹钱创办他们的事业，乔布斯卖掉了他的大众汽车，沃兹尼亚克卖掉了他的惠普计算器。
